issue.title: #20: Ability to run directly from the console with ease.

content.raw: Oh, I was just mentioning it, I am not attached to Qt for a headless program - I would keep it if it made porting easier by a big enough margin, but otherwise not. Our event loop needs, once there's no GUI are very modest, so I think many things would suffice. Python 3 even comes with its own event loop in the standard library nowadays I believe, it's possible that would do, but I'm not very familiar with it.
